title: Question about Draft normal mode
body: Im able to play draft normal mode on my level 14 account and i only own the champs you get for free and Ornn that's under 10 you unlock draft at level 10 but have to own 20 champs still able to play regardless, problem is i own the exact same amount of champs on this account plus level 12 and not able to play draft ????

replies.body: Free champions dont count to the amount that you "own"

read the post plase, i am able to play draft mode on my level 14 account and i only own Ornn but when i log into this account i can not play even know ts the same level and i own 10 champions  and when i mean OWN i mena i have bought them with rp and or be
